x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Small-scale farmers, artisans, and local producers in developing regions often face barriers to entering international markets. They lack export certifications, sustainability verification, digital presence, and logistics support. As a result, their products are undervalued, leading to income inequality and unsustainable trade practices that harm both people and the planet.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: TradeFlow - Smart Export Management Hub for SMEs.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

App Engine Studio - build the producer registry, product catalog, and export certification workflows.

IntegrationHub - connect to global trade APIs, logistics providers, and sustainability certification bodies.

Supplier Lifecycle Management (SLM) - manage producer onboarding, vetting, and ongoing compliance.

Flow Designer - automate verification and export request approvals.

Performance Analytics - monitor trade volume, sustainability ratings, and fair-trade compliance trends.

Customer Service Management (CSM) - provide producers with multilingual export guidance and buyer support.

Now Mobile - enable small producers in rural areas to register and track their export progress from mobile devices.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • APIs for trade documentation (customs, logistics, sustainability certification).
  • Secure cloud storage for product and certification data.
  • Integration with payment gateways and digital wallets.
  • Translation and localization tools for multilingual markets.
  • Blockchain or PKI-based verification for authenticity.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Standardizing diverse sustainability and trade certification frameworks.
  • Ensuring equitable access for rural producers with limited digital literacy.
  • Maintaining buyer trust and data transparency.
  • Managing export regulations across countries with different trade laws.
